name: zig-node-native-module
description: Example of a Node.js module written in Zig

scripts.build1: mkdir -p dist && zig build-lib -target aarch64-macos -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib-aarch64-macos.node
scripts.build2: mkdir -p dist && zig build-lib -target x86_64-macos -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib-x86_64-macos.node
scripts.build3: mkdir -p dist && zig build-lib -target x86_64-linux-gnu -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib-x86_64-linux.node
scripts.build4: mkdir -p dist && zig build-lib -target aarch64-linux-gnu -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib-aarch64-linux.node
scripts.build: npm run build1 && npm run build2 && npm run build3 && npm run build4

author: Andre 'Staltz' Medeiros <contact@staltz.com>
